meanings.sent1: Wearing a helmet while biking is preventing head injuries.
meanings.sent2: The lock on the door is preventing intruders from entering the house.
meanings.sent3: The clever squirrel was preventing the birds from reaching the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The bright sun was preventing the stars from shining brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The strong wind was preventing the kite from flying higher.

meanings.sent1: Regular exercise and a healthy diet are preventing illnesses.
meanings.sent2: The firewall on the computer is preventing viruses from infecting the system.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat was preventing the dog from getting its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The dense fog was preventing the sunrise from being visible.
meanings.sent5: The thick curtains were preventing sunlight from entering the room.

meanings.definition: To hinder or obstruct something from taking place
meanings.sent1: The traffic jam was preventing the ambulance from reaching the hospital quickly.
meanings.sent2: The fallen tree was preventing the hikers from continuing on the trail.
meanings.sent3: The spilled milk was preventing the cat from staying dry.
meanings.sent4: The heavy rain was preventing the outdoor event from happening as planned.
meanings.sent5: The broken bridge was preventing the cars from crossing the river.
